trc.key.category.name: The Rettington Companion
trc.option.general.title: General
trc.option.general.gamma_preset.title: Gamma preset
trc.option.general.gamma_preset.descript: Select a gamma value or choose 'Settings' for the Minecraft gamma setting.
trc.option.general.hide_armor.title: Hide armor
trc.option.general.hide_armor.descriptio: Hides the armor model from yourself and from other players.
trc.option.overlay.title: Overlay
trc.option.overlay.show_armor_hud.title: Show Armor HUD
trc.option.overlay.show_armor_hud.descri: Toggles the display of the armor items on the screen.
trc.option.overlay.show_arrow_hud.title: Show Arrow HUD
trc.option.overlay.show_arrow_hud.descri: Toggles the display of the number of arrows in your inventory on the screen.
trc.option.chat.title: Chat
trc.option.chat.section.general.title: General
trc.option.chat.optimized_chat_size.desc: Increases the chat box size to better fit longer messages.
